  • Method Details

    • commenta

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> commenta(CommentiRequest commento)
      This method allows a user to comment on a blog or a game.
      Parameters:
      commento - The CommentiRequest object containing the details of the comment to be added. The CommentiRequest object should contain the token of the user making the comment, the text of the comment, and optionally the ID of the parent comment, the ID of the game, or the ID of the blog.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing a success message if the comment was added successfully.

    • commentiUtente

      public List<CommentiResponse> commentiUtente(TokenRequest token)
      This method retrieves all comments made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      token - The token of the user for which comments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of CommentiResponse objects, each representing a comment made by the specified user. If no comments are found for the specified user, the method returns null.

    • commentiBlog

      public List<CommentiResponse> commentiBlog(Integer id_blog)
      This method retrieves all comments related to a specific blog.
      Parameters:
      id_blog - The ID of the blog for which comments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of CommentiResponse objects, each representing a comment related to the specified blog. If no comments are found for the specified blog, the method returns null.

    • commentiPartita

      public List<CommentiResponse> commentiPartita(Integer idPartita)
      This method retrieves all comments related to a specific game.
      Parameters:
      idPartita - The ID of the game for which comments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of CommentiResponse objects, each representing a comment related to the specified game. If no comments are found for the specified game, the method returns null.
